strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy weekend everyone! Here are some fun things we think you'll enjoy:

  • Giving bikes: Bike drives in Springdale and Bentonville are happening this weekend.
  • Good times on the square: The Arkansas Brewgrass Fest is this Saturday in Fayetteville!
  • On the grounds: Crystal Bridges is hosting its annual Garden Party this Sunday! 
  • Try a little: The 2022 Home Brew Showcase Fundraiser & Tasting is this weekend in Siloam Springs. 
  • Music in the sun: It’s time for those patio performances - plenty of good music this weekend.
  • Green leaves: The Benton County Master Gardeners are hosting a plant sale and garden expo this weekend in Bentonville.
  • The class: Sunny Days is hosting a mindful movement experience at the Thaden Fieldhouse this Saturday. 
  • Play ball: It’s a big weekend at Baum-Walker Stadium this weekend with the Top-25 matchup, Friday night fireworks, Saturday Stripe Out, and Kids Run the Bases Sunday!
  • Look at the stars: Hobbs State Park-Conservation Area is hosting an astronomy night tomorrow starting at 7p with solar viewing. 

Have a great weekend - congrats to those who are graduating - we'll see you Monday!
